abstract: Credit Suisse reports second-quarter profit of 170 million Swiss francs, or about $171 million, compared with profit of 1.05 billion francs in year-ago quarter; bank is facing headwinds.
lead_paragraph: The return to the black after two periods of losses gave a lift to efforts by its chief executive, Tidjane Thiam, to turn around the Swiss bank.

headline.main: Credit Suisse Posts a Surprise Profit in the Second Quarter
headline.print_headline: Still Changing Direction, Credit Suisse Reports a Slim, Surprising Profit

snippet: The return to the black after two periods of losses gave a lift to efforts by its chief executive, Tidjane Thiam, to turn around the Swiss bank....
